title: Flexible lease terms available, Built-in desks, Onsite playground
posting_body: ['2 BD | 2 BA | 1050 SQFT', 'Whether you invite friends over for a day at the pool or to show off your grill-master skills in the barbecue pavilion, Azures Apartment Homes embraces laid-back luxury and the modern comforts of today.', 'Our spacious apartment homes are outfitted with luxe details from wood-style flooring to stone countertops.', 'Plus, residents enjoy an array of indoor and outdoor amenities including a gym and fully equipped resident social lounge.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Separate dining area-Ceiling fans in living areas Select units-Built-in desks-Air
